## Proposed File Path

- Drafts SHOULD start unnumbered under `docs/standards/drafts/<slug>.md` until a number is assigned.
- Once assigned, rename/move to `docs/standards/hcs-<number>.md` or `docs/standards/hcs-<number>/index.md`.
